title: Rise of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
overview: Rise up! The Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles get an all-new look, new weapons, and awesome new powers! Join the legendary heroes, Raph, Leo, Donnie and Mikey as these brothers discover a Hidden City beneath New York, learn amazing mystic ninja skills, battle absurd mutantsâ€¦ and always find time for a slice of their favorite pizza! Cowabunga!
